Sydney Lynn Designs & Photography

A Creative Storyteller

Hello, my name is Sydney Rose and I’m a creative storyteller, among many other things. I am a photographer and designer hailing from Springfield, OH. Armed with a degree in Applied Business in Advertising Art from the School of Advertising Art (SAA), I will gladly help you tell your story, even as it unfolds. Additionally I have been an equine and animal enthusiast since I was a young girl. From admiring from afar, to riding and grooming, to now storytelling, these amazing animals hold a special place in my heart.

One of my favorite things to do is capture the bond between man and animal, and even between other people. There’s something about that unspoken relationship between two beings that has always been a fascination of mine, its something that words simply cannot explain. Thus, it is my goal and passion to capture that bond and connection in my work and represent it well so others may feel it too. Are you ready to tell your story?

Services offered

My experience and passion for many things allows me to offer many different services. Whether your are looking for lasting memories of family, timeless moments captured from your wedding day, or portraits of your loving four-legged companions, let me help you tell your unique story. Or if you need some designer input and work done, I’m happy to help!
